content: the tranquility blanket is a free crochet along ** the free crochet along starts on oct 14th 2024 ** > ** the full blanket pdf pattern is already available for purchase > here 1 ** ---------------------------------------- the pattern offers 2 blanket sizes - throw and lapghan you can choose which size you want to make this crochet along is a collaboration of 10 different designers each designed a different strip of the blanket the crochet along will take place for 6 weeks each week 2 sections will be released monday & thursday and will be available to view for free on the designer s blog the links to all the different parts will be updated on ** the main cal post 2 ** where you can also find the full event details materials needed and yarn quantities 1 until 1 single_crochet chain 1 1 mb sts left before chain-3 space skip next single_crochet 1 single_crochet chain 1 1 lb in top of mb st skip next 2 sts wattle in chain-3 space turn 1 https //madebygootie thrivecart com/tranquility-blanket-ebook/ ref=ravelry 2 https //madebygootie com/crochet/tranquility-blanket-free-crochet-pattern/
